attributes.action: Force any bank accepting any bailout by the british goverment to pass on the interest rate cut in FULL
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If the banks are going to take TAXPAYERS money, they should be forced to pass on the FULL interest rate cut, even if it takes it below their thresholds.
If it wasn't for the taxpayers the banks would have been long gone.
Right now, there are hardly any banks passing on the interest rate cut in full as it takes the rates on mortgages below the thresholds, however they take the full rate of their saving accounts!

If Gordon Brown wants to dish out OUR cash, then he should tell the Banks to pass on the FULL rate cut, if they don't agree... im sorry but they shouldn't get the cash!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
